summary: Adenike and Ayodele, a Nigerian couple living in Brooklyn, are having trouble conceiving a child - a problem that defies cultural expectations and leads Adenike to make a shocking decision that could either save or destroy her family.
cast: Danai Gurira|Isaach De Bankolé|Anthony Okungbowa|Bukky Ajayi|Yaya DaCosta|Klarissa Jackson|Ishmael Omolade|Roslyn Ruff|Chinaza Uche|Florence Egbuchulam|Mutiyat Ade-Salu|Atibon Nazaire|Deen Badarou|Da'Vine Joy Randolph|Susan Heyward|Angélique Kidjo|Lenore Thomas Douglas|Hubert Point-Du Jour|Babs Olusanmokun|Ebbe Bassey|Jennifer Akabue|Segun Akande|Abraham Amkpa|Momo Dione|Esosa E.|Ellie Foumbi|Kehinde Koyejo
keywords: two word title|punctuation in title|apostrophe in title|character name in title
title: Mother of George
